Description: Copper alloy weight, discoidal with double-grooved profile; lathe-turned with rims; face engraved with single herring-bone wreath enclosing cross above denominational mark; inlay missing; engraved circle round edge of base.
Bibliographic references: Entwistle 2008 / A Catalogue of the Late Roman and Byzantine Weights and Weighing Equipment in the British Museum (269)
